ServiceOrderDescription: [extracted short description of the problem, for example: Broken chainsaw handle]
RequestedServiceEndDateTime: [1 month from RequestedServiceStartDateTime, in this format: 2024-03-20T00:00:00Z]

to_ProductReferenceObject.ServiceReferenceProduct: [extracted product, if it is a chainsaw, return:APJPIL202309050706, if it is a shear,return:APJPIL202309050605]

to_Text.LongText: [extracted long description of the problem, for example: Customer wrote that the chainsaw's handle was broken and needs replacement, etc. Limit to 200 words.]
[extracted description of the images attached in the email]
